sources.title: 1939 Die Geliebte ( Grethe Weiser, Willy Fritsch, Erich Fiedler, Elsa Wagner)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1939. Die Geliebte.  U.a mit Grethe Weiser und Willy Fritsch

metadata.Plot: Lieutenant von Warp falls head over heels for Terese. He wants to marry her and is willing to give up his career in the Imperial Army to be with her. After he gets to know about a past affair between the bride and a comrade, the story takes a dramatic turn.
metadata.Actors: Willy Fritsch, Viktoria von Ballasko, Karl Martell
